All functions

Coerce a metadset to tibble

List available datasets from the registry

List datasets in the registry that support meta-regression

Load a dataset by registry id

Forest plot for a meta-analysis fit

Fit a meta-analysis model using metafor
new_metadset()
Create a standardized meta-analysis dataset object

Prune the on-disk registry to only datasets that support meta-regression

Load the dataset registry
standardize_columns()
Standardize raw dataset columns into (study_id, yi, vi)
suggest_moderators()
Candidate moderator columns in a standardized meta-analysis dataset
